TITLE: Episode 81 - The Economics of Medical Tyranny with Dr. Bob Murphy
DESCRIPTION: The Vixens welcome the great Bob Murphy on the show to discuss the many layers of economic destruction we have witnessed this past year, but also how exactly the healthcare system had been primed for hijacking long ago. Incentives matter, basic economics matter, data matter, and he helps bring all that to life.
